Name: Just Old
About the game: Yesterday's boy, wakes up in an unfamiliar place, in the body of an old man. We need to get out of here at all costs. Find a way out and save the poor 'old man'. Just Old - a platformer that will allow you to play as a nimble old man, in which the body of a very young man is enclosed. Go around all the obstacles, destroying monsters. Pleasant music and unique graphic style will give you a lamp atmosphere that will decorate your time spent in the game. Feature of game: - Hardcore - Nice Pixel Art - Boss
